title: Cognitive load is what matters
author: nromiun
aiHeadline: Cognitive load: the secret sauce to making you feel like you're drowning in modern life while trying to keep up with everything.

title: Are we decentralized yet?
author: Bogdanp
aiHeadline: Are we decentralized yet? Apparently not, because the internet still has opinions and we're all just stuck in this giant, interconnected echo chamber.

title: Show HN: Hacker News em dash user leaderboard pre-ChatGPT

title: Nokia’s legendary font makes for a great user interface font
author: rguiscard
aiHeadline: Nokia’s legendary font: because sometimes, the best design is the one that’s been around for decades and still looks like it was made yesterday.

title: FBI cyber cop: Salt Typhoon pwned 'nearly every American'
